pages.title: Crystal
pages.text: $(crystals) are the key resource in $(sorcerycraft). $(br)They can be obtained by mining $(crystal_ore) in the caves, for the bravest adventurers. $(br2)In $(sorcerycraft), $(crystals) are part various recipes such as $(hallowed_iron) and $(crystalised_redstone_block).

pages.title: Crystal
pages.text: One of many $(crystals) dropped on the grass.
